title: Blazing Armour - Novel Updates

description:
Turn the ruthless flames into an armour, bestow me the braveness and fearless strength-

From dissing to being attracted to each other, always ready for the battle in the frontline of natural and man-made disasters, it’s a story about how they work together to detect all kinds of arson, explosion, and even biochemistry related cases.>
